workflows.name: fetchVehiclesData
workflows.description: Fetch vehicles data from API and store in vehiclesData variable. Show loading state while fetching.

interactions.name: Edit Vehicle
interactions.description: Opens the vehicle form popup in edit mode with the selected vehicle data

interactions.name: Delete Vehicle
interactions.description: Opens the delete confirmation popup with the selected vehicle data

interactions.name: Update Vehicle Name
interactions.description: Updates the vehicle name in the form data

text.en: Vehicle name must be at least 3 characters

_ww-text_text.en: Vehicle name must be at least 3 characters

interactions.name: Close Vehicle Form
interactions.description: Closes the vehicle form popup

interactions.name: Update Vehicle Image
interactions.description: Updates the vehicle image URL in the form data

interactions.name: Cancel Delete Vehicle
interactions.description: Closes the delete vehicle popup without deleting

interactions.name: Update Vehicle Price
interactions.description: Updates the vehicle price in the form data

interactions.name: Update Vehicle Status
interactions.description: Updates the vehicle status in the form data

interactions.name: Update Vehicle Category
interactions.description: Updates the vehicle category in the form data

interactions.name: Cancel Vehicle Form
interactions.description: Closes the vehicle form popup without saving

interactions.name: Submit Vehicle Form
interactions.description: Validates and submits the vehicle form data

interactions.name: Close Delete Vehicle Popup
interactions.description: Closes the delete vehicle popup

text.en: Are you sure you want to delete this vehicle? This action cannot be undone.

_ww-text_text.en: Are you sure you want to delete this vehicle? This action cannot be undone.

interactions.name: Confirm Delete Vehicle
interactions.description: Deletes the vehicle and closes the popup
